summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of three crypto modules: Strategy Simulation, Farm Network Graph, and Alt Season Monitor - all functional with real data
passed_tests: Strategy Simulation: API returns 4 strategies as expected (EARLY_CONVICTION_ONLY, LONG_TERM_ACCUMULATORS, HIGH_AUTHENTICITY, AVOID_PUMP_EXIT)
Strategy Simulation: EARLY_CONVICTION_ONLY report displays Hit Rate, Avg Follow Through, Noise Ratio, Sample Size metrics
Strategy Simulation: Run Simulation button functional, window slider interactive
Farm Network: API returns exact expected data (8 nodes, 10 edges)
Farm Network: Graph visualizes correctly with interactive nodes and edges
Farm Network: Min Score filter and Refresh button working
Farm Network: Top Shared Farm Connections table shows expected actors (pump_master, shill_king)
Alt Season: API returns ASP probability (45%) and market state data
Alt Season: Top Opportunities table displays 5 tokens with SOL and RNDR
Alt Season: Token Momentum table shows 8 tokens with proper scoring
All 10 backend API endpoints returning 200 status with correct data structure
No error messages or broken UI elements across all three modules
